$ 24:1:1 Senior 33618|33622 Gajo 20643 carissimo 8131 , 0 quem 31334 ego 18310 diligo 17434 in 22344|22345 veritate 37471 . 0 

$ 24:1:2 Carissime 8131|8208 , 0 de 15641 omnibus 27594|27595|27608 orationem 27778 facio 19647 prospere 30945|30945 te 36715 ingredi 23029 , 0 et 18886 valere 37203 sicut 33943|33944 prospere 30945|30945 agit 2232 anima 3497|3499 tua 36716 . 0 \ 0 

$ 24:1:3 Gavisus 20718 sum 38114 valde 37205 venientibus 37400 fratribus 20384 , 0 et 18886 testimonium 35969 perhibentibus 28858 veritati 37471 tu'ae 36716 , 0 sicut 33943|33944 tu 36715 in 22344|22345 veritate 37471 ambulas 2956 . 0 

$ 24:1:4 Majorem 25258|25304 horum 21187 non 26897|26898 habeo 21189 gratiam 21058 , 0 quam 31334|31531|31532 ut 37111 audiam 5533 filios 20071 meos 25636 in 22344|22345 veritate 37471 ambulare 2956|2956 . 0 

$ 24:1:5 Carissime 8131|8208 , 0 fideliter 20046 facis 19647|19850 quidquid 33 operaris 27631|27632|27631 in 22344|22345 fratres 20384 , 0 et 18886 hoc 21187 in 22344|22345 peregrinos 28781|28782|28783 , 0 

$ 24:1:6 qui 31334|31601|31618 testimonium 35969 reddiderunt 32028 caritati 8235 tu'ae 36716 in 22344|22345 conspectu 13438|13448 ecclesi'ae 18147 : 0 quos 31334 , 0 benefaciens 6337 , 0 deduces 15998|16011 digne 17396|17398|17403 Deo 15643 . 0 

$ 24:1:7 Pro 30563 nomine 26884|26893 enim 18610 ejus 21891|21892 profecti 30686|30687 sunt 38114 , 0 nihil 26809 accipientes 410 a 1|2|3|4|5 gentibus 20808 . 0 

$ 24:1:8 Nos 26514 ergo 18792 debemus 15668 suscipere 35478 hujusmodi 21187|26076|26092 , 0 ut 37111 cooperatores 14110 simus 34007|38114 veritatis 37471 . 0 \ 0 

$ 24:1:9 Scripsissem 33300 forsitan 20334 ecclesi'ae 18147 : 0 sed 33433 is 18105|21891 qui 31334|31601|31618 amat 2859 primatum 30504|30505 gerere 20842 in 22344|22345 eis 21891|21892 , 0 Diotrephes 0 , 0 non 26897|26898 recipit 31956 nos 26514 : 0 

$ 24:1:10 propter 30885 hoc 21187 si 33909 venero 37387|37400 , 0 commonebo 11497 ejus 21891|21892 opera 27630|27631|27767 , 0 qu'ae 31334 facit 19647 , 0 verbis 37438 malignis 25356 garriens 20702 in 22344|22345 nos 26514 : 0 et 18886 quasi 31578|31579 non 26897|26898 ei 18322|21891|21892 ista 24014 sufficiant 35170 , 0 neque 26742|26743 ipse 23916 suscipit 35478 fratres 20384 : 0 et 18886 eos 21891|21892 qui 31334|31601|31618 suscipiunt 35478 , 0 prohibet 30724 , 0 et 18886 de 15641 ecclesia 18147 ejicit 18334 . 0 

$ 24:1:11 Carissime 8131|8208 , 0 noli 26882 imitari 22079 malum 25312|25313|25314|25317 , 0 sed 33433 quod 31385|31700|31701 bonum 6788|6789|6790 est 18196|38114 . 0 Qui 31334|31601|31618 benefacit 6337 , 0 ex 19025 Deo 15643 est 18196|38114 : 0 qui 31334|31601|31618 malefacit 25335 , 0 non 26897|26898 vidit 37658 Deum 15643 . 0 \ 0 

$ 24:1:12 Demetrio 16445|16446|36620 testimonium 35969 redditur 32028 ab 6 omnibus 27594|27595|27608 , 0 et 18886 ab 6 ipsa 23916 veritate 37471 , 0 sed 33433 et 18886 nos 26514 testimonium 35969 perhibemus 28858 : 0 et 18886 nosti 26920|38109 quoniam 31723 testimonium 35969 nostrum 26514|26926|26927 verum 37430|37431|37433|37527 est 18196|38114 . 0 \ 0 

$ 24:1:13 Multa 26330|26331|26332|26333|38093 habui 21189 tibi 36715 scribere 33300 : 0 sed 33433 nolui 26882 per 28661 atramentum 5353 et 18886 calamum 7421 scribere 33300 tibi 36715 . 0 

$ 24:1:14 Spero 34415 autem 5726 protinus 30985 te 36715 videre 37658 , 0 et 18886 os 27894|27895|27896 ad 706|707 os 27894|27895|27896 loquemur 25001 . 0 Pax 28478 tibi 36715 . 0 Salutant 32938 te 36715 amici 3002|3003|3010 . 0 Saluta 32938 amicos 3002|3003 nominatim 26890 . 0
